name: Oboz Bozeman Low Shoes - Men's
description:
Be ready to hit sidewalks or trails in these casual shoes with a distinct mountain town vibe. The Bozeman merge classic, skate-shoe aesthetics with the ruggedness of an approach shoe.Uppers use waterproof nubuck and quick drying Repreve® recycled textiles.O FIT Insole™ use dual-density Bloom™ Algae foam – Bloom foam has a reduced carbon footprint compared to standard foams.Poron® shock absorber pods in heel and forefoot add protection to high-impact zones.Dual-density EVA midsole.Durable, board lasted construction.

        Sustainability
